text: Ponte Tresa was a municipality in Lugano in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. With an area of 0.28 kmÂ², Ponte Tresa is the smallest municipality in Switzerland. On 18 April 2021, the former municipalities of Croglio, Monteggio, Ponte Tresa and Sessa merged to form the new municipality of Tresa. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Former municipalities of Ticino
title: Ponte Tresa
